name: PigoopDog
description:
You're an alien dog!
Bark at Pigoops and herd them into the jaws of the hungry monster! ;D
Don't forget to cook them first!

TIP! He's a picky eater!!! Negative points for food he doesn't like!

Can you get the secret ending?

Made for the "alien" and "crafting" theme for Jamcraft 5 :) Alien by the setting, and crafting by the cooking mechanic of combining different objects!

Team:

  • Haiyoooo: Design, Art, Code
  • Lycraix: Code

Credits:

  • Pig/Fart SFX by Eric
  • Slime voice by Lycraix
  • Explosion SFX by http://www.freesound.org
  • Bg music by https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Kevin_MacLeod
